metadata.synopsis: A kobold who's imbibed a touch too much and passes out in front of the party.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Drunk kobold stumbles into corridor when player enters monastery via gap in window on left of courtyard.

0.speaker: Kobold Looter
0.text: What... What do you mean 'too drunk'... 'S not possible...
0.context: NodeContext: Slurred, drunk, verge of pasing out
